column3: â€œMaui Citrus Punch is a very pleasant sativa.  I got one gram as part of a sativa bundle from Pot Cargo. I appreciate being able to sample many different strains when purchasing these bundles. This strain produces a cerebral high that is uplifting and mellow. The pain relieving effect is reasonably good for mild pain. This is definitely more of a head high/mood elevating kind of strain. The only unwanted effect of thi...â€

column3: â€œThis has to be hands down the best looking bud I have seen in a long time! I also couldn't get enough of that citrus smell combine with its smooth and earthy flavour. The cerebral effects were well balanced with an enjoyable body sedation that was relaxing while the mind was uplifted and energetic. I definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a truly enjoyable sativa.â€
